#id=1
#text=Today I hopped on my bike to take a ride to the supermarket .
#id=2
#text=When I sat down , I noticed my tire was flat .
#id=3
#text=I looked down , and sure enough there was no air in the tire .
#id=4
#text=I went to go get my air pump and fill up the tire .
#id=5
#text=I unscrewed the cover of the nozzle and then attached the bicycle pump to it .
#id=6
#text=I then filled the bicycle tire with air .
#id=7
#text=After that , I released the bicycle pump and screwed the cover back on .
#id=8
#text=Then I rode my bicycle a little bit to see if the tire would remain inflated .
#id=9
#text=After a couple of loops around the street , I noticed the tire was beginning to flatten again , so I decided to replace the bicycle 's inner tube .
#text=I went to get my spare inner tube as well as a screwdriver and wrench .
#text=I unbolted the wheel from the bicycle with the wrench .
#text=Then I used the screw driver to take the tire and old inner tube out .
#text=I brought out the new inner tube and placed it inside the tire , then put both back on the wheel and put the wheel on the bike .
#text=I took out my air pump and filled the tire with air until it was firm .
#text=When I rode around this time the tire remained firm , so I put my things away and rode to the supermarket .
